title: Fossils: clues to prehistoric times
brief_description: This film explains where fossils are found, how they are formed and what clues they offer about the development of life. Uses museum dioramas, animation and many fossil specimens to explain the work and findings of scientists.
description: This film explains where fossils are found, how they are formed and what clues they offer about the development of life. Uses museum dioramas, animation and many fossil specimens to explain the work and findings of scientists.
